title: Longevity gets its own legal playbook at ArentFox Schiff
summary: The Am Law 100 firm launches a dedicated group to guide companies shaping the future of health, wellness and human longevity. Longevity has reached a new milestone, and it didn’t come from a lab or a startup pitch deck. When a major US law firm builds a dedicated practice around an emerging sector, it usually […] The post Longevity gets its own legal playbook at ArentFox Schiff appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
author: Kyle Umipig
